description:
In which the act of r*pe has been legalized as long as the purpose is child-making,
schoolgirls are r*ped on the train, mothers and daughters in the house and idols on the stage!
And even two girls who beat up a guy who was trying to commit r*pe are...
Source: DLsite

titles.title: Être violée n’importe où, n’importe quand
いつでもどこでも犯しまくるっ!!
